Chu's first ancestors came from Emperor Zhuan Xu Gao Yang. Gao Yang was Yellow Emperor's grandson, Chang Yi's son. Gao Yang begot Cheng. Cheng begot Juan Zhang. Juan Zhang begot Chong Li. Chong Li served Emperor Ku Gao Xin as fire official. He had great merit and could illuminate and unite the world. Emperor Ku named him Zhu Rong. The Gong Gong clan made rebellion. Emperor Ku sent Chong Li to execute them but he did not complete it. The emperor then executed Chong Li on the Geng Yin day, and made his younger brother Wu Hui Chong Li's successor. He again served as fire official and became Zhu Rong.

Wu Hui begot Lu Zhong. Lu Zhong begot six sons. They were born by splitting open. His eldest named Kun Wu; Second named Shen Hu; Third named Peng Zu; Fourth named Hui Ren; Fifth surnamed Cao; Sixth named Ji Lian, surnamed Mi. Chu were their descendants. The Kun Wu clan, in Xia times, once was a marquis elder. In Jie's time, Tang extinguished it. The Peng Zu clan, in Yin times, once was a marquis elder. In Yin's last age, the Peng Zu clan was extinguished. Ji Lian begot Fu Ju. Fu Ju begot Xue Xiong. Their descendants declined in the middle period. Some were in the central states, some in the barbarian Yi. They could not record their generations.

Zhou Wen Wang time, Ji Lian's descendants named Yu Xiong. Yu Xiong died early. His son was named Xiong Li. Xiong Li begot Xiong Kuang. Xiong Kuang begot Xiong Yi. Xiong Yi, in Zhou Cheng Wang's time, was raised as Wen and Wu's diligent labor descendants, and Xiong Yi was enfeoffed in Chu barbarian lands. He was enfeoffed with zi and nan fields, surnamed Mi clan, and resided at Dan Yang. Chu zi Xiong Yi with Lu gong Bo Qin, Wei Kang Shu son Mu, Jin hou Xie, Qi eldest son LÃ¼ Ji all served Cheng Wang.

Xiong Yi begot Xiong Ai. Xiong Ai begot Xiong Dan. Xiong Dan begot Xiong Sheng. Xiong Sheng made his younger brother Xiong Yang his successor. Xiong Yang begot Xiong Qu.

Xiong Qu begot three sons. In Zhou Yi Wang's time, the wang chamber declined. Some feudal lords did not attend court and attacked each other. Xiong Qu greatly obtained harmony with the people between Jiang and Han, so he raised troops and attacked Yong and Yang Lao, reaching E. Xiong Qu said: 'I barbarian Yi, not with central states titles posthumous names.' He then established his eldest son Kang as Gou Dan wang, middle son Hong as E wang, and youngest son Zhi Ci as Yue Zhang wang, all in the Chu barbarian lands on the Jiang. When Zhou Li Wang's time, he was tyrannical and cruel. Xiong Qu feared he would attack Chu, so he also removed their wang titles.

Later he became Xiong Wu Kang, and Wu Kang died early. Xiong Qu died, and his son Xiong Zhi Hong was established. Zhi Hong died, and his younger brother assassinated him and replaced him as established, named Xiong Yan. Xiong Yan begot Xiong Yong.

In Xiong Yong's sixth year, the Zhou people made rebellion, attacked Li Wang, and Li Wang fled to Zhi. In Xiong Yong's tenth year, he died, and his younger brother Xiong Yan became successor.

In Xiong Yan's tenth year, he died. He had four sons: eldest Bo Shuang, middle Zhong Xue, next Shu Kan, youngest Ji Xun. Xiong Yan died, and his eldest son Bo Shuang replaced him as established. This was Xiong Shuang.

In Xiong Shuang's first year, Zhou Xuan Wang was first established. In Xiong Shuang's sixth year, he died, and his three younger brothers contended for establishment. Zhong Xue died; Shu Kan fled, avoided difficulty at Pu; But the youngest brother Ji Xun was established. This was Xiong Xun. In Xiong Xun's sixteenth year, Zheng Huan Gong was first enfeoffed at Zheng. In the twenty-second year, Xiong Xun died, and his son Xiong E was established. In Xiong E's ninth year, he died, and his son Xiong Yi was established. This was Ruo Ao.

In Ruo Ao's twentieth year, Zhou You Wang was assassinated by Quan Rong, Zhou moved east, and Qin Xiang Gong began to be ranked as feudal lords.

In the twenty-seventh year, Ruo Ao died, and his son Xiong Kan was established. This was Xiao Ao. In Xiao Ao's sixth year, he died, and his son Xiong Shen was established. This was Fen Mao. In Fen Mao's thirteenth year, Jin began disorder, because of Qu Wo. In Fen Mao's seventeenth year, he died. Fen Mao's younger brother Xiong Tong assassinated Fen Mao's son and replaced him as established. This was Chu Wu Wang.

æ­¦ç‹åä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œæ™‰ä¹‹æ›²æ²ƒèŠä¼¯å¼’ä¸»åœ‹æ™‰å­ä¾¯ã€‚ åä¹å¹´ï¼Œé„­ä¼¯å¼Ÿæ®µä½œäº‚ã€‚ äºŒåä¸€å¹´ï¼Œé„­ä¾µå¤©å­ä¹‹ç”°ã€‚ äºŒåä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œè¡›å¼’å…¶å›æ¡“å…¬ã€‚ äºŒåä¹å¹´ï¼Œé­¯å¼’å…¶å›éš±å…¬ã€‚ ä¸‰åä¸€å¹´ï¼Œå®‹å¤ªå®°è¯ç£å¼’å…¶å›æ®¤å…¬ã€‚
Wu Wang seventeenth year, Jin's Qu Wo Zhuang Bo assassinated main state Jin Xiao Hou. In the nineteenth year, Zheng bo's younger brother Duan made rebellion. In the twenty-first year, Zheng invaded the tian zi's fields. In the twenty-third year, Wei assassinated their lord Huan Gong. In the twenty-ninth year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong. In the thirty-first year, Song grand steward Hua Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong.

In the thirty-fifth year, Chu attacked Sui. Sui said: 'I no crime.' Chu said: 'I barbarian Yi. Now the feudal lords all become rebels who mutually invade, or mutually kill. I have worn armor, desire with observe central states governance, request wang chamber honor my title.' The Sui people acted as intermediaries for them and requested to honor Chu. The wang chamber did not listen and returned to report to Chu. Thirty-seventh year, Chu Xiong Tong angered said: 'My ancestor Yu Xiong, Wen Wang teacher, early ended. Cheng Wang raised my first duke, then with zi nan fields ordered reside Chu, barbarian Yi all led submit, but wang not added position, I self honor.' He then self-established as Wu Wang, allied with the Sui people, and departed. Thereupon he began to open the Pu lands and possess them.

In the fifty-first year, Zhou summoned the Sui hou and reproached him for establishing Chu as wang. Chu was angered because Sui turned back on them and attacked Sui. Wu Wang died in the midst of the army and the troops were dismissed. His son Wen Wang Xiong Zi was established and began to make Ying the capital.

Wen Wang second year, attacked Shen passed Deng, Deng people said 'Chu wang easy take', Deng hou not permitted. In the sixth year, he attacked Cai, captured Cai Ai Hou to return, and then released him. Chu was strong and overawed the small countries between Jiang and Han. The small countries all feared it. In the eleventh year, Qi Huan Gong began his hegemony, and Chu also began to become great.

In the twelfth year, he attacked Deng and extinguished it. In the thirteenth year, he died, and his son Xiong Jian was established. This was Zhuang Ao. In Zhuang Ao's fifth year, he desired to kill his younger brother Xiong Yun. Yun fled to Sui and with Sui attacked, assassinated Zhuang Ao, and replaced him as established. This was Cheng Wang.

In Cheng Wang Yun's first year, initially ascending the throne, he spread virtue and applied favor, tying old friendships with the feudal lords. Sent people offered tian zi, tian zi granted blessing, said: 'Pacify your southern Yi Yue disorder, do not invade central states.' Thereupon Chu's lands were a thousand li.

In the sixteenth year, Qi Huan Gong with troops invaded Chu and arrived at Xing Mountain. Chu Cheng Wang sent the general Qu Wan with troops to resist them and allied with Huan Gong. Huan Gong reproached that Zhou's taxes did not enter the wang chamber. Chu permitted it, and he then departed.

In the eighteenth year, Cheng Wang with troops attacked Xu to the north. The Xu lord bared his flesh and apologized, so he released him. In the twenty-second year, he attacked Huang. In the twenty-sixth year, he extinguished Ying.

In the thirty-third year, Song Xiang Gong desired to make an alliance meeting and summoned Chu. Chu wang angered said: 'Summon me, I will properly go attack humiliate him.' He then proceeded, arrived at Yu, then seized and humiliated the Song gong, and then returned him. In the thirty-fourth year, Zheng Wen Gong attended court at Chu to the south. Chu Cheng Wang attacked Song to the north, defeated them at Hong, shot and wounded Song Xiang Gong. Xiang Gong then died from his illness and wound.

In the thirty-fifth year, Jin gong zi Chong Er passed through Chu. Cheng Wang feasted him with the feudal lords' guest ritual and thickly sent him to Qin.

In the thirty-ninth year, Lu Xi Gong came and requested troops to attack Qi. Chu sent Shen Hou to lead troops and attack Qi, took Gu, and placed Qi Huan Gong's son Yong there. Qi Huan Gong's seven sons all fled to Chu, and Chu completely made them upper grandees. He extinguished Kui because Kui did not sacrifice to Zhu Rong and Yu Xiong.

In summer, he attacked Song. Song reported urgent to Jin. Jin saved Song, and Cheng Wang dismissed and returned. General Zi Yu requested battle, Cheng Wang said: 'Chong Er fled resided outside long, ultimately obtained return country, heaven's opening, not resistable.' Zi Yu firmly requested, so he gave him few troops and departed. Jin indeed defeated Zi Yu at Cheng Pu. Cheng Wang was angered and executed Zi Yu.

In the forty-sixth year, initially, Cheng Wang would make Shang Chen the crown prince and told the Ling Yin Zi Shang. Zi Shang said: 'Lord's age not yet, and moreover many inner favorites, demoting then rebellion. Chu country's selections often in young ones. Moreover Shang Chen wasp eyes and wolf voice, cruel person, not establishable.' The wang did not listen and established him. Later he again desired to establish his son Zhi and demote the crown prince Shang Chen. Shang Chen heard but not confirmed, told his tutor Pan Chong said: 'How obtain its truth?' Chong said: 'Feast wang's favored consort Jiang Mi but not respect.' Shang Chen followed it. Jiang Mi angered said: 'Suitable wang's desire kill you and establish Zhi.' Shang Chen told Pan Chong said: 'Believed.' Chong said: 'Can serve him?' Said: 'Cannot.' 'Can flee away?' Said: 'Cannot.' 'Can do great matter?' Said: 'Can.' In winter, tenth month, Shang Chen with palace guard troops surrounded Cheng Wang. Cheng Wang requested to eat bear paws and die, but they did not listen. On Ding Wei, Cheng Wang strangled himself and died. Shang Chen replaced him as established. This was Mu Wang.

Mu Wang was established and gave his crown prince's palace to Pan Chong, making him grand tutor to grasp state affairs. In Mu Wang's third year, he extinguished Jiang. In the fourth year, he extinguished Liu and Liao. Liu and Liao were Gao Tao's descendants. In the eighth year, he attacked Chen. In the twelfth year, he died. His son Zhuang Wang Lu was established.

Zhuang Wang ascended throne three years, not issued commands, day night for pleasure, ordered state middle said: 'Have dare admonish die without pardon!' Wu Ju entered and admonished. Zhuang Wang embraced Zheng Ji on the left and Yue woman on the right, sitting amidst bells and drums. Wu Ju said: 'Wish have advance metaphor.' Said: 'Have bird at mound, three years not fly not cry, what bird?' Zhuang Wang said: 'Three years not fly, fly will rush heaven; Three years it does not cry, but when it cries it will startle people. Ju retreated, I know it.' After several months, his licentiousness increased even more. The grandee Su Cong then entered and admonished. Wang said: 'You not hear command?' Answered said: 'Kill body to enlighten lord, minister's wish.' Thereupon he dismissed licentious pleasure and listened to governance. Those executed numbered several hundred people. Those advanced numbered several hundred people. He entrusted Wu Ju and Su Cong with governance, and the state people were greatly pleased. This year he extinguished Yong. In the sixth year, he attacked Song and captured five hundred chariots.

In the eighth year, he attacked the Lu Hun Rong, then arrived at Luo, and displayed troops in Zhou's outskirts. Zhou Ding Wang sent Wang Sun Man to congratulate the Chu wang. Chu wang asked tripods small large light heavy, answered said: 'In virtue not in tripods.' Zhuang Wang said: 'You not hinder nine tripods! Chu state broken hook beak, sufficient for nine tripods.' Wang Sun Man said: 'Alas! Lord wang perhaps forget it? In the former flourishing of Yu and Xia, distant places all arrived. They contributed gold from the nine regions and cast tripods imaging things. The hundred things were prepared for them, making people know divine wickedness. Jie had chaotic virtue. The tripods moved to Yin and endured for six hundred sacrifices. Yin Zhou was tyrannical and cruel. The tripods moved to Zhou. Virtue's good brightness, though small must heavy; Its wicked and perverse dim disorder - though great it must be light. Former Cheng Wang fixed tripods at Jia Yu, divined generations thirty, divined years seven hundred, heaven's command. Though Zhou virtue has declined, the heavenly mandate has not changed. Tripods' light heavy, not yet can ask.' The Chu wang then returned.

In the ninth year, he made the Ruo Ao clan prime minister. People some slandered it to wang, feared execution, counterattacked wang, wang attacked extinguished Ruo Ao clan's lineage. In the thirteenth year, he extinguished Shu.

In the sixteenth year, he attacked Chen and killed Xia Zheng Shu. Zheng Shu had assassinated his lord, therefore he executed him. Having already broken Chen, he immediately made it a county. The group of ministers all congratulated. Shen Shu Shi came as envoy from Qi and did not congratulate. Wang asked, answered said: 'Vulgar saying: Leading ox through person's field, field owner takes its ox. Through one then not straight, taking its ox not also excessive? Moreover wang because Chen's disorder led feudal lords attacked it, with righteousness attacked it but greedy its county, also how to again command world!' Zhuang Wang then restored the state of Chen later.

In the seventeenth year, spring, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Zheng and conquered it in three months. Entered from Huang gate, Zheng bo bared flesh led sheep to welcome, said: 'Orphan not heaven, cannot serve lord, lord used cherished anger, reached humble city, orphan's crime. Dare not only command listen! Make it a guest in the southern sea. If you grant it as minister or concubine to the feudal lords, I also listen only to your command. If lord not forget Li, Xuan, Huan, Wu, not cut their altars soil, make change serve lord, orphan's wish, not what dare hope. Dare spread inner thoughts.' Chu group ministers said: 'Wang do not permit.' Zhuang Wang said: 'Its lord can lower people, must can trust use its people, how can cut off!' Zhuang Wang personally held the flag and waved the army with his left and right. He led the troops to depart thirty li and camped, then permitted peace. Pan Wang entered to ally, and Zi Liang went out as hostage. In summer, sixth month, Jin saved Zheng and battled with Chu. They greatly defeated the Jin army on the river upper, then arrived at Heng Yong and returned.

In the twentieth year, he surrounded Song because they had killed a Chu envoy. He surrounded Song for five months. Food in the city was exhausted. They exchanged sons to eat and split bones to cook. Song Hua Yuan went out and told the situation. Zhuang Wang said: 'Superior man!' He then dismissed the troops and departed.

In Gong Wang's sixteenth year, Jin attacked Zheng. Zheng reported urgent, and Gong Wang saved Zheng. He battled with Jin troops at Yan Ling. Jin defeated Chu and shot, hitting Gong Wang's eye. Gong Wang summoned the general Zi Fan. Zi Fan was addicted to wine. His follower Shu Yang Gu presented wine and got him drunk. Kang Wang favored his younger brothers Gong zi Wei, Zi Bi, Zi Xi, and Qi Ji. In Jia Ao's third year, he made his young uncle Kang Wang's younger brother Gong zi Wei the Ling Yin to master military affairs. In the fourth year, Wei was envoy to Zheng, but en route heard of the wang's illness and returned. In the twelfth month on Ji You, Wei entered and inquired about the wang's illness. He strangled and assassinated him, then killed his sons Mo and Ping Xia. He sent an envoy to announce to Zheng. Wu Ju asked said: 'Who for successor?' Answered said: 'Our grandee Wei.' Wu Ju changed said: 'Gong Wang son Wei for elder.' Zi Bi fled to Jin, and Wei was established. This was Ling Wang.

In Ling Wang's third year, sixth month, Chu sent an envoy to tell Jin, desiring to meet with the feudal lords. The feudal lords all met Chu at Shen. Wu Ju said: 'Former Xia Qi had Gou Tai feast, Shang Tang had Jing Bo command, Zhou Wu Wang had Meng Jin oath, Cheng Wang had Qi Yang meeting, Kang Wang had Feng Gong court, Mu Wang had Tu Shan assembly, Qi Huan had Zhao Ling army, Jin Wen had Jian Tu alliance, lord what use?' Ling Wang said: 'Use Huan Gong.' At the time, Zheng Zi Chan was there. Thereupon Jin, Song, Lu, and Wei did not go. Ling Wang had already allied and had an arrogant expression. Wu Ju said: 'Jie for You Reng assembly, You Min rebelled him. Zhou held the Li Shan assembly, and the eastern Yi rebelled against him. You Wang held the Tai Shi alliance, and the Rong and Di rebelled against him. Lord be careful end!'

In the eleventh year, he attacked Xu to frighten Wu. Ling Wang lodged at Qian Xi to await them. Wang said: 'Qi, Jin, Lu, Wei, their enfeoffments all received precious vessels, I alone not. He exposed himself to dew and blue vines to dwell in the grass wilds. He trudged through mountains and forests to serve the heavenly son, contributing only peach bows and thorn arrows to the wang's affairs. In the twelfth year, spring, Chu Ling Wang enjoyed Qian Xi and could not depart. The state people suffered from the corvee. Initially, Ling Wang assembled troops at Shen, executed Yue grandee Chang Shou Guo, and killed Cai grandee Guan Qi. Qi's son Cong fled and was in Wu. He then urged the Wu wang to attack Chu, to alienate Yue grandee Chang Shou Guo and make him rebel, acting as alienation for Wu. He sent a falsified command from Gong zi Qi Ji to summon Gong zi Bi from Jin. He arrived at Cai and, with Wu and Yue troops, desired to attack Cai. He commanded Gong zi Bi to see Qi Ji and ally at Deng. They then entered and killed Ling Wang's crown prince Lu. They established Zi Bi as wang, Gong zi Zi Xi as Ling Yin, and Qi Ji as Si Ma. First cleared wang palace, Guan Cong followed army at Qian Xi, commanded Chu masses said: 'State has wang. Those who return first will have their ranks, fiefs, fields, and chambers restored. Later ones move them.' The Chu masses all collapsed and departed from Ling Wang to return.

Initially, Zi Bi from Jin returned, Han Xuan Zi asked Shu Xiang said: 'Zi Bi will succeed?' Answered said: 'Will not succeed.' Xuan Zi said: 'Same evil seek each other, like market merchants, why not succeed?' Answered said: 'No with same good, who with same evil? Taking state has five difficulties: have favor no people, one; Have people no master, two; Have master no plan, three; Have plan but no people, four; Having people but no virtue is the fifth. Zi Bi in Jin thirteen years, Jin, Chu followers not heard communicating, can be called no people; Clan exhausted kin rebelled, can be called no master; No rift moved, can be called no plan; As hostage ended life, can be called no people; He fled with no beloved signs. This can be called having no virtue. Wang cruel not cautious, Zi Bi crossed five difficulties to assassinate lord, who can succeed him! Have Chu state, perhaps Qi Ji? He rules Chen and Cai. Fang Cheng belongs to the outer regions. Harsh evils do not arise. Robbers and bandits hide and conceal themselves. Private desires are not violated. The people have no resentful heart. The former spirits commanded it. The state people believe it. Mi surname has disorder, must younger brother actually established, Chu's constant. Zi Bi's office, then Right Yin; Count his noble favor, then concubine son; By spirits commanded, then moreover far from it; People no cherish him, how establish?' He had former grandee Zi Yu and Zi Fan as his inner heart, Wei Chou and Jia Tuo as his limbs, Qi, Song, Qin, and Chu as outer masters, and Luan, Xi, Hu, and Xian as inner masters. He fled for nineteen years and guarded his will increasingly firmly. Hui and Huai abandoned the people, but the people followed and gave themselves to him. Therefore Wen Gong had state, not also fitting? Zi Bi no bestow on people, no aid from outside, departed Jin, Jin not sent; When he returned to Chu, Chu did not welcome him. How have state!' æ˜­ç‹ä¹‹å‡ºéƒ¢ä¹Ÿï¼Œä½¿ç”³é®‘èƒ¥è«‹æ•‘æ–¼ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦ä»¥è»Šäº”ç™¾ä¹˜æ•‘æ¥šï¼Œæ¥šäº¦æ”¶é¤˜æ•£å…µï¼Œèˆ‡ç§¦æ“Šå³ã€‚ åä¸€å¹´å…­æœˆï¼Œæ•—å³æ–¼ç¨·ã€‚ æœƒå³ç‹å¼Ÿå¤«æ¦‚è¦‹å³ç‹å…µå‚·æ•—ï¼Œä¹ƒäº¡æ­¸ï¼Œè‡ªç«‹ç‚ºç‹ã€‚ é—”é–­èä¹‹ï¼Œå¼•å…µå»æ¥šï¼Œæ­¸æ“Šå¤«æ¦‚ã€‚ å¤«æ¦‚æ•—ï¼Œå¥”æ¥šï¼Œæ¥šå°ä¹‹å ‚è°¿ï¼Œè™Ÿç‚ºå ‚è°¿æ°ã€‚
When Zhao Wang fled Ying, he sent Shen Bao Xu to request aid from Qin. Qin sent five hundred chariots to save Chu. Chu also gathered their remaining scattered troops and attacked Wu together with Qin. In the eleventh year, sixth month, they defeated Wu at Ji. Fu Gai, the Wu wang's younger brother, saw that the Wu wang's troops were wounded and defeated. He then fled back and established himself as wang. He Lu heard this and led troops to depart from Chu. He returned to attack Fu Gai. Fu Gai was defeated and fled to Chu. Chu enfeoffed him at Tang Xi and called him the Tang Xi clan.

æ¥šæ˜­ç‹æ»…å”ä¹æœˆï¼Œæ­¸å…¥éƒ¢ã€‚ åäºŒå¹´ï¼Œå³å¾©ä¼æ¥šï¼Œå–ç•ªã€‚ æ¥šæï¼Œå»éƒ¢ï¼ŒåŒ—å¾™éƒ½é„€ã€‚
Chu Zhao Wang extinguished Tang after nine months and returned to enter Ying. In the twelfth year, Wu again attacked Chu and took Fan. Chu feared and departed from Ying. They moved the capital north to Dui.

In the sixteenth year, Confucius became prime minister of Lu. In the twentieth year, Chu extinguished Dun and extinguished Hu. In the twenty-first year, Wu wang He Lu attacked Yue. In the twenty-seventh year, spring, Wu attacked Chen. Chu Zhao Wang saved it and camped at Cheng Fu. In the tenth month, Zhao Wang fell ill in the army camp. There were red clouds like a bird that flanked the sun and flew. Zhao Wang asked Zhou grand astrologer, grand astrologer said: 'This harms Chu wang, however can shift to generals ministers.' The generals and ministers heard these words and then requested to pray to the spirits with their own bodies. Zhao Wang said: 'Generals ministers, orphan's limbs, now shift calamity, how abandon these bodies!' He did not listen. They divined and the River caused calamity. The grandees requested to pray to the River. Zhao Wang said: 'Since my former wang received enfeoffment, gaze not exceeded Jiang, Han, and River not what obtained crime.' He stopped and did not permit it. Confucius in Chen, heard these words, said: 'Chu Zhao Wang penetrated great way. His not lose state, fitting!'

æ˜­ç‹ç—…ç”šï¼Œä¹ƒå¬è«¸å…¬å­å¤§å¤«æ›°ï¼šã€Œå­¤ä¸ä½ï¼Œå†è¾±æ¥šåœ‹ä¹‹å¸«ï¼Œä»Šä¹ƒå¾—ä»¥å¤©å£½çµ‚ï¼Œå­¤ä¹‹å¹¸ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ è®“å…¶å¼Ÿå…¬å­ç”³ç‚ºç‹ï¼Œä¸å¯ã€‚ åˆè®“æ¬¡å¼Ÿå…¬å­çµï¼Œäº¦ä¸å¯ã€‚ ä¹ƒåˆè®“æ¬¡å¼Ÿå…¬å­é–­ï¼Œäº”è®“ï¼Œä¹ƒå¾Œè¨±ç‚ºç‹ã€‚ å°‡æˆ°ï¼Œåºšå¯…ï¼Œæ˜­ç‹å’æ–¼è»ä¸­ã€‚ å­é–­æ›°ï¼šã€Œç‹ç—…ç”šï¼Œæ¨å…¶å­è®“ç¾¤è‡£ï¼Œè‡£æ‰€ä»¥è¨±ç‹ï¼Œä»¥å»£ç‹æ„ä¹Ÿã€‚ ä»Šå›ç‹å’ï¼Œè‡£è±ˆæ•¢å¿˜å›ç‹ä¹‹æ„ä¹ï¼ã€ ä¹ƒèˆ‡å­è¥¿ã€å­ç¶¦è¬€ï¼Œä¼å¸«é–‰æ¶‚ï¼Œè¿è¶Šå¥³ä¹‹å­ç« ç«‹ä¹‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ç‚ºæƒ ç‹ã€‚ ç„¶å¾Œç½·å…µæ­¸ï¼Œè‘¬æ˜­ç‹ã€‚
Zhao Wang illness severe, then summoned various gong zi grandees said: 'Orphan not talented, twice humiliated Chu state troops, now able to with heaven longevity end, orphan's fortune.' He yielded to his younger brother Gong zi Shen to be wang, but it was not possible. He again yielded to his next younger brother Gong zi Jie, but it was also not possible. He then again yielded to his next younger brother Gong zi Lv. After five yields, he was afterward permitted to be wang. About to battle, on Geng Yin, Zhao Wang died in the army camp. Zi Lv said: 'Wang illness severe, abandoned his son yielded to group ministers, minister so permitted wang, to broaden wang intent. Now lord wang died, minister how dare forget lord wang intent!' He then planned with Zi Xi and Zi Qi. They hid troops and closed the roads. They welcomed the Yue woman's son Zhang and established him. This was Hui Wang. They then dismissed the troops and returned. They buried Zhao Wang.

In Hui Wang's second year, Zi Xi summoned the former Ping Wang crown prince Jian's son Sheng from Wu. He made him the Chao grandee and called him White Gong. White Gong loved troops and lowered himself to scholars. He desired to avenge. In the sixth year, White Gong requested troops from Ling Yin Zi Xi to attack Zheng. Initially, White Gong's father Jian fled and was in Zheng. Zheng killed him. White Gong fled to Wu. Zi Xi summoned him again. Therefore he resented Zheng with this and desired to attack it. Zi Xi permitted it but did not yet mobilize troops. In the eighth year, Jin attacked Zheng. Zheng reported urgent to Chu. Chu sent Zi Xi to save Zheng, but he received a bribe and departed. White Gong Sheng was angered. He then, with brave and strong dead soldiers like Shi Qi, surprise killed Ling Yin Zi Xi and Zi Qi at court. Therefore he kidnapped Hui Wang and placed him at the high office, desiring to assassinate him. Hui Wang's follower Qu Gu carried the wang and fled to Zhao Wang's lady's palace. White Gong established himself as wang. More than a month later, Ye Gong came to save Chu. Chu Hui Wang's followers attacked White Gong together with him and killed him. Hui Wang then restored his position. This year, they extinguished Chen and made it a county.

In the seventh year, Qi Meng Chang Jun's father Tian Ying deceived Chu. Chu Wei Wang attacked Qi, defeated them at Xu Zhou, and commanded that Qi must expel Tian Ying. In the sixth year, Chu sent Zhu Guo Zhao Yang to lead troops and attack Wei. He broke them at Xiang Ling and obtained eight towns. He again shifted troops to attack Qi, and the Qi wang was worried. Chen Zhen just as Qin envoy Qi, Qi wang said: 'Do for it what?' Chen Zhen said: 'Wang do not worry, please command stop it.' Immediately went saw Zhao Yang army middle, said: 'Wish hear Chu state law, break army kill general how reward?' Zhao Yang said: 'His office becomes upper pillar state, enfeoffed upper rank holds jade tablet.' Chen Zhen said: 'Is there honor greater than this?' Zhao Yang said: 'Ling Yin.' Chen Zhen said: 'Now lord already Ling Yin, this state crown above. Minister please get parable it.' Someone left his attendants one cup wine, attendants mutually said: 'Several people drink this, not sufficient circulate, please then draw ground for snake, snake first complete alone drink it.' One person said: 'My snake first complete.' Raised wine rose, said: 'I can for it feet.' When reached made feet for it, then other person seized wine drank it, said: 'Snake originally no feet, now made feet for it, this not snake.' Now the lord as prime minister of Chu attacked Wei, broke the army and killed the general. No merit is greater. Nothing can be added above the crown. Now again shift troops attack Qi, attack Qi win it, office rank not add to this; Attack not win, body die rank seize, have harm to Chu: this for snake make feet saying. Not if lead troops depart bestow virtue Qi, this hold full technique.' Zhao Yang said: 'Good.' He led troops and departed.

The Yan and Han lords first called themselves wang. Qin sent Zhang Yi to meet with Chu, Qi, and Wei. They allied at Nie Sang.

åä¸€å¹´ï¼Œè˜‡ç§¦ç´„å¾å±±æ±å…­åœ‹å…±æ”»ç§¦ï¼Œæ¥šæ‡·ç‹ç‚ºå¾é•·ã€‚ è‡³å‡½è°·é—œï¼Œç§¦å‡ºå…µæ“Šå…­åœ‹ï¼Œå…­åœ‹å…µçš†å¼•è€Œæ­¸ï¼Œé½Šç¨å¾Œã€‚ åäºŒå¹´ï¼Œé½Šæ¹£ç‹ä¼æ•—è¶™ã€é­è»ï¼Œç§¦äº¦ä¼æ•—éŸ“ï¼Œèˆ‡é½Šçˆ­é•·ã€‚
In the eleventh year, Su Qin allied the six states east of the mountains to together attack Qin. Chu Huai Wang was the alliance leader. They arrived at Han Gu pass. Qin sent troops to attack the six states. The six states' troops all withdrew and returned. Qi was alone and later. In the twelfth year, Qi Min Wang attacked and defeated the Zhao and Wei armies. Qin also attacked and defeated Han. They contended for leadership with Qi.

åå…­å¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ¬²ä¼é½Šï¼Œè€Œæ¥šèˆ‡é½Šå¾è¦ªï¼Œç§¦æƒ ç‹æ‚£ä¹‹ï¼Œä¹ƒå®£è¨€å¼µå„€å…ç›¸ï¼Œä½¿å¼µå„€å—è¦‹æ¥šç‹ï¼Œè¬‚æ¥šç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ•é‚‘ä¹‹ç‹æ‰€ç”šèªªè€…ç„¡å…ˆå¤§ç‹ï¼Œé›–å„€ä¹‹æ‰€ç”šé¡˜ç‚ºé–€é—Œä¹‹å»è€…äº¦ç„¡å…ˆå¤§ç‹ã€‚ æ•é‚‘ä¹‹ç‹æ‰€ç”šæ†è€…ç„¡å…ˆé½Šç‹ï¼Œé›–å„€ä¹‹æ‰€ç”šæ†è€…äº¦ç„¡å…ˆé½Šç‹ã€‚ è€Œå¤§ç‹å’Œä¹‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ä»¥æ•é‚‘ä¹‹ç‹ä¸å¾—äº‹ç‹ï¼Œè€Œä»¤å„€äº¦ä¸å¾—ç‚ºé–€é—Œä¹‹å»ä¹Ÿã€‚ ç‹ç‚ºå„€é–‰é—œè€Œçµ•é½Šï¼Œä»Šä½¿ä½¿è€…å¾å„€è¥¿å–ç¬”ç§¦æ‰€åˆ†æ¥šå•†æ–¼ä¹‹åœ°æ–¹å…­ç™¾é‡Œï¼Œå¦‚æ˜¯å‰‡é½Šå¼±çŸ£ã€‚ æ˜¯åŒ—å¼±é½Šï¼Œè¥¿å¾·æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œç§å•†æ–¼ä»¥ç‚ºå¯Œï¼Œæ­¤ä¸€è¨ˆè€Œä¸‰åˆ©ä¿±è‡³ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ æ‡·ç‹å¤§æ‚…ï¼Œä¹ƒç½®ç›¸ç’½æ–¼å¼µå„€ï¼Œæ—¥èˆ‡ç½®é…’ï¼Œå®£è¨€ã€Œå¾å¾©å¾—å¾å•†æ–¼ä¹‹åœ°ã€ã€‚ ç¾¤è‡£çš†è³€ï¼Œè€Œé™³è»«ç¨å¼”ã€‚ æ‡·ç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œä½•æ•…ï¼Ÿã€ é™³è»«å°æ›°ï¼šã€Œç§¦ä¹‹æ‰€ç‚ºé‡ç‹è€…ï¼Œä»¥ç‹ä¹‹æœ‰é½Šä¹Ÿã€‚ ä»Šåœ°æœªå¯å¾—è€Œé½Šäº¤å…ˆçµ•ï¼Œæ˜¯æ¥šå­¤ä¹Ÿã€‚ å¤«ç§¦åˆä½•é‡å­¤åœ‹å“‰ï¼Œå¿…è¼•æ¥šçŸ£ã€‚ ä¸”å…ˆå‡ºåœ°è€Œå¾Œçµ•é½Šï¼Œå‰‡ç§¦è¨ˆä¸ç‚ºã€‚ å…ˆçµ•é½Šè€Œå¾Œè²¬åœ°ï¼Œå‰‡å¿…è¦‹æ¬ºæ–¼å¼µå„€ã€‚ è¦‹æ¬ºæ–¼å¼µå„€ï¼Œå‰‡ç‹å¿…æ€¨ä¹‹ã€‚ æ€¨ä¹‹ï¼Œæ˜¯è¥¿èµ·ç§¦æ‚£ï¼ŒåŒ—çµ•é½Šäº¤ã€‚ è¥¿èµ·ç§¦æ‚£ï¼ŒåŒ—çµ•é½Šäº¤ï¼Œå‰‡å…©åœ‹ä¹‹å…µå¿…è‡³ã€‚ è‡£æ•…å¼”ã€‚ã€ æ¥šç‹å¼—è½ï¼Œå› ä½¿ä¸€å°‡è»è¥¿å—å°åœ°ã€‚
Sixteenth year, Qin desired attack Qi, but Chu with Qi allied close, Qin Hui Wang worried it, then proclaimed Zhang Yi dismissed prime minister, sent Zhang Yi south saw Chu wang, told Chu wang said: 'My humble state's wang what very pleases has none before great wang, though Yi what very wishes to be gate barrier servant also none before great wang. What my humble state wang hates most has none before the Qi wang. Though what I hate most also has none before the Qi wang. But the great wang allies with him. Therefore my humble state wang cannot serve the wang, and causes Yi also cannot be a gate barrier servant. The wang, for Yi, closes the pass and cuts off Qi. Now sending an envoy to follow Yi west to take the brush - the land of six hundred li that Qin divided from Chu at Shang Yu. Like this, then Qi will be weak. This north weakens Qi, west virtue to Qin, privately Shang Yu as wealth, this one plan three benefits all arrive.' Huai Wang greatly pleased, then placed prime minister seal on Zhang Yi, daily with him set wine, proclaimed 'I again obtain my Shang Yu land.' The group of ministers all congratulated, but Chen Zhen alone mourned. Huai Wang said: 'Why?' Chen Zhen answered said: 'Qin what for respects wang, because wang has Qi. Now the land is not yet obtainable but the Qi alliance is first cut off. This makes Chu isolated. Indeed, what does Qin respect about an isolated state? They will certainly slight Chu. Moreover, if we first give the land and then cut off Qi, then Qin's plan will not work. If we first cut off Qi and then demand the land, we will certainly be deceived by Zhang Yi. Being deceived by Zhang Yi, the wang will certainly resent it. Resenting it will raise Qin calamity to the west and cut off Qi alliance to the north. Raising Qin calamity to the west and cutting off Qi alliance to the north will cause both states' troops to certainly arrive. Minister therefore mourn.' The Chu wang did not listen. He therefore sent one general west to receive the enfeoffed land.

å¼µå„€è‡³ç§¦ï¼Œè©³é†‰å¢œè»Šï¼Œç¨±ç—…ä¸å‡ºä¸‰æœˆï¼Œåœ°ä¸å¯å¾—ã€‚ æ¥šç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œå„€ä»¥å¾çµ•é½Šç‚ºå°šè–„é‚ªï¼Ÿã€ ä¹ƒä½¿å‹‡å£«å®‹éºåŒ—è¾±é½Šç‹ã€‚ é½Šç‹å¤§æ€’ï¼ŒæŠ˜æ¥šç¬¦è€Œåˆæ–¼ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦é½Šäº¤åˆï¼Œå¼µå„€ä¹ƒèµ·æœï¼Œè¬‚æ¥šå°‡è»æ›°ï¼šã€Œå­ä½•ä¸å—åœ°ï¼Ÿ å¾æŸè‡³æŸï¼Œå»£è¢¤å…­é‡Œã€‚ã€ æ¥šå°‡è»æ›°ï¼šã€Œè‡£ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥è¦‹å‘½è€…å…­ç™¾é‡Œï¼Œä¸èå…­é‡Œã€‚ã€ å³ä»¥æ­¸å ±æ‡·ç‹ã€‚ æ‡·ç‹å¤§æ€’ï¼Œèˆˆå¸«å°‡ä¼ç§¦ã€‚ é™³è»«åˆæ›°ï¼šã€Œä¼ç§¦éè¨ˆä¹Ÿã€‚ ä¸å¦‚å› è³‚ä¹‹ä¸€åéƒ½ï¼Œèˆ‡ä¹‹ä¼é½Šï¼Œæ˜¯æˆ‘äº¡æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œå–å„Ÿæ–¼é½Šä¹Ÿï¼Œå¾åœ‹å°šå¯å…¨ã€‚ ä»Šç‹å·²çµ•æ–¼é½Šè€Œè²¬æ¬ºæ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œæ˜¯å¾åˆç§¦é½Šä¹‹äº¤è€Œä¾†å¤©ä¸‹ä¹‹å…µä¹Ÿï¼Œåœ‹å¿…å¤§å‚·çŸ£ã€‚ã€ æ¥šç‹ä¸è½ï¼Œé‚çµ•å’Œæ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œç™¼å…µè¥¿æ”»ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦äº¦ç™¼å…µæ“Šä¹‹ã€‚
Zhang Yi arrived at Qin. He pretended to be drunk and fell from his chariot. He claimed illness and did not come out for three months. The land was not obtainable. Chu wang said: 'Yi because I cut off Qi still considers thin?' He then sent the brave warrior Song Yi north to insult the Qi wang. The Qi wang was greatly angered. He broke the Chu tally and allied with Qin. Qin Qi allied, Zhang Yi then rose court, told Chu general said: 'You why not accept land? From so-and-so to so-and-so, breadth length six li.' Chu general said: 'Minister what received command six hundred li, not heard six li.' He immediately returned with this and reported to Huai Wang. Huai Wang was greatly angered. He raised troops and was about to attack Qin. Chen Zhen again said: 'Attacking Qin not plan. It would be better to bribe it with one famous city and attack Qi together with it. This way we lose to Qin but take compensation from Qi. Our state can still be preserved. Now wang already cut off from Qi but demand deceived by Qin, this makes us unite Qin Qi alliance and bring world's troops, state certainly greatly harmed.' The Chu wang did not listen. He then cut off peace with Qin and mobilized troops to attack Qin to the west. Qin also mobilized troops and attacked it.

åä¸ƒå¹´æ˜¥ï¼Œèˆ‡ç§¦æˆ°ä¸¹é™½ï¼Œç§¦å¤§æ•—æˆ‘è»ï¼Œæ–¬ç”²å£«å…«è¬ï¼Œè™œæˆ‘å¤§å°‡è»å±ˆä¸ã€è£¨å°‡è»é€¢ä¾¯ä¸‘ç­‰ä¸ƒåé¤˜äººï¼Œé‚å–æ¼¢ä¸­ä¹‹éƒ¡ã€‚ æ¥šæ‡·ç‹å¤§æ€’ï¼Œä¹ƒæ‚‰åœ‹å…µå¾©è¥²ç§¦ï¼Œæˆ°æ–¼è—ç”°ï¼Œå¤§æ•—æ¥šè»ã€‚ éŸ“ã€é­èæ¥šä¹‹å›°ï¼Œä¹ƒå—è¥²æ¥šï¼Œè‡³æ–¼é„§ã€‚ æ¥šèï¼Œä¹ƒå¼•å…µæ­¸ã€‚
In the seventeenth year, spring, we battled with Qin at Dan Yang. Qin greatly defeated our army, beheaded eighty thousand armored soldiers, captured our grand general Qu Gai, deputy general Feng Hou Chou and more than seventy others, and then took the Han Zhong commandery. Chu Huai Wang was greatly angered. He then sent all the state's troops to again attack Qin. They battled at Lan Tian and greatly defeated the Chu army. Han, Wei heard Chu's distress, then south attacked Chu, reached Deng. Chu heard and then led the troops back.

åå…«å¹´ï¼Œç§¦ä½¿ä½¿ç´„å¾©èˆ‡æ¥šè¦ªï¼Œåˆ†æ¼¢ä¸­ä¹‹åŠä»¥å’Œæ¥šã€‚ æ¥šç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œé¡˜å¾—å¼µå„€ï¼Œä¸é¡˜å¾—åœ°ã€‚ã€ å¼µå„€èä¹‹ï¼Œè«‹ä¹‹æ¥šã€‚ ç§¦ç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ¥šä¸”ç”˜å¿ƒæ–¼å­ï¼ŒæŸ°ä½•ï¼Ÿã€ å¼µå„€æ›°ï¼šã€Œè‡£å–„å…¶å·¦å³é³å°šï¼Œé³å°šåˆèƒ½å¾—äº‹æ–¼æ¥šç‹å¹¸å§¬é„­è¢–ï¼Œè¢–æ‰€è¨€ç„¡ä¸å¾è€…ã€‚ ä¸”å„€ä»¥å‰ä½¿è² æ¥šä»¥å•†æ–¼ä¹‹ç´„ï¼Œä»Šç§¦æ¥šå¤§æˆ°ï¼Œæœ‰æƒ¡ï¼Œè‡£éé¢è‡ªè¬æ¥šä¸è§£ã€‚ ä¸”å¤§ç‹åœ¨ï¼Œæ¥šä¸å®œæ•¢å–å„€ã€‚ èª æ®ºå„€ä»¥ä¾¿åœ‹ï¼Œè‡£ä¹‹é¡˜ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ å„€é‚ä½¿æ¥šã€‚
In the eighteenth year, Qin sent an envoy who promised to again become close with Chu and divided half of Han Zhong to make peace with Chu. Chu wang said: 'Wish obtain Zhang Yi, not wish obtain land.' Zhang Yi heard this and requested to go to Chu. Qin wang said: 'Chu moreover content with you, what to do?' Zhang Yi said: 'Minister friendly with his attendants Jin Shang, Jin Shang moreover can obtain service with Chu wang favored concubine Zheng Xiu, Xiu what said none not followed. Moreover, I previously as envoy wronged Chu with the Shang Yu agreement. Now Qin and Chu have had a great battle with enmity. I must apologize to Chu in person to resolve it. Moreover, with the great wang present, Chu would not dare to take Yi. Truly kill Yi to benefit state, minister's wish.' Yi then went as envoy to Chu.

è‡³ï¼Œæ‡·ç‹ä¸è¦‹ï¼Œå› è€Œå›šå¼µå„€ï¼Œæ¬²æ®ºä¹‹ã€‚ å„€ç§æ–¼é³å°šï¼Œé³å°šç‚ºè«‹æ‡·ç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ‹˜å¼µå„€ï¼Œç§¦ç‹å¿…æ€’ã€‚ å¤©ä¸‹è¦‹æ¥šç„¡ç§¦ï¼Œå¿…è¼•ç‹çŸ£ã€‚ã€ åˆè¬‚å¤«äººé„­è¢–æ›°ï¼šã€Œç§¦ç‹ç”šæ„›å¼µå„€ï¼Œè€Œç‹æ¬²æ®ºä¹‹ï¼Œä»Šå°‡ä»¥ä¸Šåº¸ä¹‹åœ°å…­ç¸£è³‚æ¥šï¼Œä»¥ç¾äººè˜æ¥šç‹ï¼Œä»¥å®®ä¸­å–„æ­Œè€…ç‚ºä¹‹åªµã€‚ æ¥šç‹é‡åœ°ï¼Œç§¦å¥³å¿…è²´ï¼Œè€Œå¤«äººå¿…æ–¥çŸ£ã€‚ å¤«äººä¸è‹¥è¨€è€Œå‡ºä¹‹ã€‚ã€ é„­è¢–å’è¨€å¼µå„€æ–¼ç‹è€Œå‡ºä¹‹ã€‚ å„€å‡ºï¼Œæ‡·ç‹å› å–„é‡å„€ï¼Œå„€å› èªªæ¥šç‹ä»¥å›å¾ç´„è€Œèˆ‡ç§¦åˆè¦ªï¼Œç´„å©šå§»ã€‚ å¼µå„€å·²å»ï¼Œå±ˆåŸä½¿å¾é½Šä¾†ï¼Œè««ç‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œä½•ä¸èª…å¼µå„€ï¼Ÿã€ æ‡·ç‹æ‚”ï¼Œä½¿äººè¿½å„€ï¼Œå¼—åŠã€‚ æ˜¯æ­²ï¼Œç§¦æƒ ç‹å’ã€‚
He arrived, but Huai Wang did not see him. Therefore he imprisoned Zhang Yi and desired to kill him. Yi privately with Jin Shang, Jin Shang for requested Huai Wang said: 'Detain Zhang Yi, Qin wang certainly angry. World sees Chu without Qin, certainly slight wang.' Again told lady Zheng Xiu said: 'Qin wang very loves Zhang Yi, but wang desires kill him, now will with Shang Yong land six counties bribe Chu, with beauty betroth Chu wang, with palace good singers for attendants. The Chu wang values land. The Qin woman will certainly be noble, but the lady will certainly be demoted. Lady not if speak release him.' Zheng Xiu finally spoke to the wang and had Zhang Yi released. Yi was released. Huai Wang therefore treated Yi well. Yi therefore persuaded the Chu wang to break the alliance agreement and become close with Qin, agreeing to marriage. Zhang Yi already departed, Qu Yuan envoy from Qi came, admonished wang said: 'Why not execute Zhang Yi?' Huai Wang regretted it and sent people to pursue Yi, but they did not catch him. This year, Qin Hui Wang died.

äºŒåï¼»å…­ï¼½å¹´ï¼Œé½Šæ¹£ç‹æ¬²ç‚ºå¾é•·ï¼Œæƒ¡æ¥šä¹‹èˆ‡ç§¦åˆï¼Œä¹ƒä½¿ä½¿éºæ¥šç‹æ›¸æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¯¡äººæ‚£æ¥šä¹‹ä¸å¯Ÿæ–¼å°Šåä¹Ÿã€‚ ä»Šç§¦æƒ ç‹æ­»ï¼Œæ­¦ç‹ç«‹ï¼Œå¼µå„€èµ°é­ï¼Œæ¨—è£ç–¾ã€å…¬å­«è¡ç”¨ï¼Œè€Œæ¥šäº‹ç§¦ã€‚ å¤«æ¨—è£ç–¾å–„ä¹éŸ“ï¼Œè€Œå…¬å­«è¡å–„ä¹é­ï¼› æ¥šå¿…äº‹ç§¦ï¼ŒéŸ“ã€é­æï¼Œå¿…å› äºŒäººæ±‚åˆæ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œå‰‡ç‡•ã€è¶™äº¦å®œäº‹ç§¦ã€‚ å››åœ‹çˆ­äº‹ç§¦ï¼Œå‰‡æ¥šç‚ºéƒ¡ç¸£çŸ£ã€‚ ç‹ä½•ä¸èˆ‡å¯¡äººå¹¶åŠ›æ”¶éŸ“ã€é­ã€ç‡•ã€è¶™ï¼Œèˆ‡ç‚ºå¾è€Œå°Šå‘¨å®¤ï¼Œä»¥æ¡ˆå…µæ¯æ°‘ï¼Œä»¤æ–¼å¤©ä¸‹ï¼Ÿ è«æ•¢ä¸æ¨‚è½ï¼Œå‰‡ç‹åæˆçŸ£ã€‚ ç‹ç‡è«¸ä¾¯å¹¶ä¼ï¼Œç ´ç§¦å¿…çŸ£ã€‚ ç‹å–æ­¦é—œã€èœ€ã€æ¼¢ä¹‹åœ°ï¼Œç§å³ã€è¶Šä¹‹å¯Œè€Œæ“…æ±Ÿæµ·ä¹‹åˆ©ï¼ŒéŸ“ã€é­å‰²ä¸Šé»¨ï¼Œè¥¿è–„å‡½è°·ï¼Œå‰‡æ¥šä¹‹å½Šç™¾è¬ä¹Ÿã€‚ ä¸”ç‹æ¬ºæ–¼å¼µå„€ï¼Œäº¡åœ°æ¼¢ä¸­ï¼Œå…µéŠ¼è—ç”°ï¼Œå¤©ä¸‹è«ä¸ä»£ç‹æ‡·æ€’ã€‚ ä»Šä¹ƒæ¬²å…ˆäº‹ç§¦ï¼ é¡˜å¤§ç‹å­°è¨ˆä¹‹ã€‚ã€
Twenty [six] year, Qi Min Wang desired be alliance leader, hated Chu's alliance with Qin, then sent envoy sent Chu wang letter said: 'I worry Chu not discern honorable name. Now Qin Hui Wang has died and Wu Wang is established. Zhang Yi has fled to Wei. Chu Li Ji and Gong Sun Yan are employed, but Chu serves Qin. Indeed Chu Li Ji friendly with Han, and Gong Sun Yan friendly with Wei; Chu will certainly serve Qin. Han and Wei will fear and certainly seek to unite with Qin through these two people. Then Yan and Zhao will also appropriately serve Qin. If four states contend to serve Qin, then Chu will become mere commanderies and counties. Wang why not with I combine strength gather Han, Wei, Yan, Zhao, with them form alliance honor Zhou chamber, to quell troops rest people, command world? None will dare not to happily obey. Then the wang's reputation will be complete. The wang leading the feudal lords in united attack will certainly break Qin. The wang takes the lands of Wu Guan, Shu, and Han, privately enjoys Wu and Yue's wealth and monopolizes the Jiang and Hai profits. Han and Wei cede Shang Dang, and to the west approaches Han Gu. Then Chu's strength will be a million. Moreover the wang was deceived by Zhang Yi, lost the land of Han Zhong, troops were worn at Lan Tian. The world none do not harbor anger on the wang's behalf. Now moreover desires first serve Qin! Wish great wang carefully plan it.'

æ¥šç‹æ¥­å·²æ¬²å’Œæ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œè¦‹é½Šç‹æ›¸ï¼ŒçŒ¶è±«ä¸æ±ºï¼Œä¸‹å…¶è­°ç¾¤è‡£ã€‚ ç¾¤è‡£æˆ–è¨€å’Œç§¦ï¼Œæˆ–æ›°è½é½Šã€‚ æ˜­é›æ›°ï¼šã€Œç‹é›–æ±å–åœ°æ–¼è¶Šï¼Œä¸è¶³ä»¥åˆ·æ¥ï¼› å¿…ä¸”å–åœ°æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œè€Œå¾Œè¶³ä»¥åˆ·æ¥æ–¼è«¸ä¾¯ã€‚ ç‹ä¸å¦‚æ·±å–„é½Šã€éŸ“ä»¥é‡æ¨—è£ç–¾ï¼Œå¦‚æ˜¯å‰‡ç‹å¾—éŸ“ã€é½Šä¹‹é‡ä»¥æ±‚åœ°çŸ£ã€‚ ç§¦ç ´éŸ“å®œé™½ï¼Œè€ŒéŸ“çŒ¶å¾©äº‹ç§¦è€…ï¼Œä»¥å…ˆç‹å¢“åœ¨å¹³é™½ï¼Œè€Œç§¦ä¹‹æ­¦é‚å»ä¹‹ä¸ƒåé‡Œï¼Œä»¥æ•…å°¤ç•ç§¦ã€‚ ä¸ç„¶ï¼Œç§¦æ”»ä¸‰å·ï¼Œè¶™æ”»ä¸Šé»¨ï¼Œæ¥šæ”»æ²³å¤–ï¼ŒéŸ“å¿…äº¡ã€‚ æ¥šä¹‹æ•‘éŸ“ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½¿éŸ“ä¸äº¡ï¼Œç„¶å­˜éŸ“è€…æ¥šä¹Ÿã€‚ éŸ“å·²å¾—æ­¦é‚æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œä»¥æ²³å±±ç‚ºå¡ï¼Œæ‰€å ±å¾·è«å¦‚æ¥šåšï¼Œè‡£ä»¥ç‚ºå…¶äº‹ç‹å¿…ç–¾ã€‚ é½Šä¹‹æ‰€ä¿¡æ–¼éŸ“è€…ï¼Œä»¥éŸ“å…¬å­çœ›ç‚ºé½Šç›¸ä¹Ÿã€‚ éŸ“å·²å¾—æ­¦é‚æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œç‹ç”šå–„ä¹‹ï¼Œä½¿ä¹‹ä»¥é½Šã€éŸ“é‡æ¨—è£ç–¾ï¼Œç–¾å¾—é½Šã€éŸ“ä¹‹é‡ï¼Œå…¶ä¸»å¼—æ•¢æ£„ç–¾ä¹Ÿã€‚ ä»Šåˆç›Šä¹‹ä»¥æ¥šä¹‹é‡ï¼Œæ¨—é‡Œå­å¿…è¨€ç§¦ï¼Œå¾©èˆ‡æ¥šä¹‹ä¾µåœ°çŸ£ã€‚ã€ æ–¼æ˜¯æ‡·ç‹è¨±ä¹‹ï¼Œç«Ÿä¸åˆç§¦ï¼Œè€Œåˆé½Šä»¥å–„éŸ“ã€‚
The Chu wang already desired peace with Qin. He saw the Qi wang's letter and hesitated undecided. He put it to the group of ministers to discuss. The group of ministers some said to make peace with Qin, others said to listen to Qi. Zhao Ju said: 'Wang though east take land from Yue, not sufficient wash shame; He must moreover take land from Qin, and only then will it be sufficient to wash shame before the feudal lords. The wang should deeply befriend Qi and Han to give weight to Chu Li Ji. Like this, the wang will obtain Han and Qi's importance to seek land. Qin broke Han's Yi Yang, but Han still again served Qin because their former wang's tombs were in Ping Yang, and Qin's Wu Sui was only seventy li distant. Therefore they especially feared Qin. Not so. If Qin attacks San Chuan, Zhao attacks Shang Dang, and Chu attacks He Wai, Han will certainly perish. Chu's saving of Han cannot make Han not perish, however the one who preserves Han is Chu. Han has already obtained Wu Sui from Qin, using river and mountains as a barrier. What repays virtue is none thicker than Chu. The minister thinks they will serve the wang certainly quickly. What Qi is trusted by Han is because Han gong zi Mei serves as Qi's prime minister. Han has already obtained Wu Sui from Qin. The wang very befriended it and sent it with Qi and Han's weight to Chu Li Ji. Ji obtained Qi and Han's weight. His master does not dare abandon Ji. Now again increase with Chu weight, Chu Li Zi certainly speak Qin, again give Chu invaded lands.' Thereupon Huai Wang permitted it. He finally did not ally with Qin, but allied with Qi to befriend Han.
83
äºŒåå››å¹´ï¼Œå€é½Šè€Œåˆç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦æ˜­ç‹åˆç«‹ï¼Œä¹ƒåšè³‚æ–¼æ¥šã€‚ æ¥šå¾€è¿å©¦ã€‚ äºŒåäº”å¹´ï¼Œæ‡·ç‹å…¥èˆ‡ç§¦æ˜­ç‹ç›Ÿï¼Œç´„æ–¼é»ƒæ£˜ã€‚ ç§¦å¾©èˆ‡æ¥šä¸Šåº¸ã€‚ äºŒåå…­å¹´ï¼Œé½Šã€éŸ“ã€é­ç‚ºæ¥šè² å…¶å¾è¦ªè€Œåˆæ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œä¸‰åœ‹å…±ä¼æ¥šã€‚ æ¥šä½¿å¤ªå­å…¥è³ªæ–¼ç§¦è€Œè«‹æ•‘ã€‚ ç§¦ä¹ƒé£å®¢å¿é€šå°‡å…µæ•‘æ¥šï¼Œä¸‰åœ‹å¼•å…µå»ã€‚
In the twenty-fourth year, he betrayed Qi and allied with Qin. Qin Zhao Wang was first established and then heavily bribed Chu. Chu went to welcome the bride. In the twenty-fifth year, Huai Wang entered and allied with Qin Zhao Wang, with the agreement at Huang Ji. Qin again gave Shang Yong to Chu. In the twenty-sixth year, Qi, Han, and Wei, because Chu betrayed the alliance's closeness and allied with Qin, the three states together attacked Chu. Chu sent the crown prince to enter as hostage in Qin and requested aid. Qin then sent guest minister Tong to lead troops and save Chu. The three states withdrew their troops and departed.
84
äºŒåä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦å¤§å¤«æœ‰ç§èˆ‡æ¥šå¤ªå­é¬¬ï¼Œæ¥šå¤ªå­æ®ºä¹‹è€Œäº¡æ­¸ã€‚ äºŒåå…«å¹´ï¼Œç§¦ä¹ƒèˆ‡é½Šã€éŸ“ã€é­å…±æ”»æ¥šï¼Œæ®ºæ¥šå°‡å”çœ›ï¼Œå–æˆ‘é‡ä¸˜è€Œå»ã€‚ äºŒåä¹å¹´ï¼Œç§¦å¾©æ”»æ¥šï¼Œå¤§ç ´æ¥šï¼Œæ¥šè»æ­»è€…äºŒè¬ï¼Œæ®ºæˆ‘å°‡è»æ™¯ç¼ºã€‚ æ‡·ç‹æï¼Œä¹ƒä½¿å¤ªå­ç‚ºè³ªæ–¼é½Šä»¥æ±‚å¹³ã€‚ ä¸‰åå¹´ï¼Œç§¦å¾©ä¼æ¥šï¼Œå–å…«åŸã€‚ ç§¦æ˜­ç‹éºæ¥šç‹æ›¸æ›°ï¼šã€Œå§‹å¯¡äººèˆ‡ç‹ç´„ç‚ºå¼Ÿå…„ï¼Œç›Ÿäºé»ƒæ£˜ï¼Œå¤ªå­ç‚ºè³ªï¼Œè‡³é©©ä¹Ÿã€‚ å¤ªå­é™µæ®ºå¯¡äººä¹‹é‡è‡£ï¼Œä¸è¬è€Œäº¡å»ï¼Œå¯¡äººèª ä¸å‹æ€’ï¼Œä½¿å…µä¾µå›ç‹ä¹‹é‚Šã€‚ ä»Šèå›ç‹ä¹ƒä»¤å¤ªå­è³ªæ–¼é½Šä»¥æ±‚å¹³ã€‚ å¯¡äººèˆ‡æ¥šæ¥å¢ƒå£¤ç•Œï¼Œæ•…ç‚ºå©šå§»ï¼Œæ‰€å¾ç›¸è¦ªä¹…çŸ£ã€‚ è€Œä»Šç§¦æ¥šä¸é©©ï¼Œå‰‡ç„¡ä»¥ä»¤è«¸ä¾¯ã€‚ å¯¡äººé¡˜èˆ‡å›ç‹æœƒæ­¦é—œï¼Œé¢ç›¸ç´„ï¼Œçµç›Ÿè€Œå»ï¼Œå¯¡äººä¹‹é¡˜ä¹Ÿã€‚ æ•¢ä»¥èä¸‹åŸ·äº‹ã€‚ã€ æ¥šæ‡·ç‹è¦‹ç§¦ç‹æ›¸ï¼Œæ‚£ä¹‹ã€‚ æ¬²å¾€ï¼Œæè¦‹æ¬ºï¼› ç„¡å¾€ï¼Œæç§¦æ€’ã€‚ æ˜­é›æ›°ï¼šã€Œç‹æ¯‹è¡Œï¼Œè€Œç™¼å…µè‡ªå®ˆè€³ã€‚ ç§¦è™ç‹¼ï¼Œä¸å¯ä¿¡ï¼Œæœ‰å¹¶è«¸ä¾¯ä¹‹å¿ƒã€‚ã€ æ‡·ç‹å­å­è˜­å‹¸ç‹è¡Œï¼Œæ›°ï¼šã€ŒæŸ°ä½•çµ•ç§¦ä¹‹é©©å¿ƒï¼ã€ æ–¼æ˜¯å¾€æœƒç§¦æ˜­ç‹ã€‚ æ˜­ç‹è©ä»¤ä¸€å°‡è»ä¼å…µæ­¦é—œï¼Œè™Ÿç‚ºç§¦ç‹ã€‚ æ¥šç‹è‡³ï¼Œå‰‡é–‰æ­¦é—œï¼Œé‚èˆ‡è¥¿è‡³å’¸é™½ï¼Œæœç« è‡ºï¼Œå¦‚è•ƒè‡£ï¼Œä¸èˆ‡äº¢ç¦®ã€‚ æ¥šæ‡·ç‹å¤§æ€’ï¼Œæ‚”ä¸ç”¨æ˜­å­è¨€ã€‚ ç§¦å› ç•™æ¥šç‹ï¼Œè¦ä»¥å‰²å·«ã€é»”ä¸­ä¹‹éƒ¡ã€‚ æ¥šç‹æ¬²ç›Ÿï¼Œç§¦æ¬²å…ˆå¾—åœ°ã€‚ æ¥šç‹æ€’æ›°ï¼šã€Œç§¦è©æˆ‘è€Œåˆå½Šè¦æˆ‘ä»¥åœ°ï¼ã€ ä¸å¾©è¨±ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦å› ç•™ä¹‹ã€‚
In the twenty-seventh year, a Qin grandee privately fought with the Chu crown prince. The Chu crown prince killed him and fled back. In the twenty-eighth year, Qin then together with Qi, Han, and Wei attacked Chu. They killed Chu general Tang Mei, took our Chong Qiu, and departed. In the twenty-ninth year, Qin again attacked Chu and greatly broke Chu. Twenty thousand of the Chu army died. They killed our general Jing Que. Huai Wang feared and then sent the crown prince as hostage to Qi to seek peace. In the thirtieth year, Qin again attacked Chu and took eight cities. Qin Zhao Wang sent Chu wang letter said: 'Beginning I with wang agreed be brothers, allied at Huang Ji, crown prince as hostage, arrived harmony. The crown prince insulted and killed my important minister. He did not apologize and fled away. I truly cannot bear the anger and sent troops to invade the lord wang's borders. Now I hear that the lord wang has commanded the crown prince to be hostage in Qi to seek peace. I connect borders and territories with Chu. Therefore we made marriage alliances. What we followed has been mutually close for a long time. But now Qin and Chu are not harmonious. Then there is no way to command the feudal lords. I wish to meet with the lord wang at Wu Guan, face to face agree, form an alliance and depart. This is my wish. Dare to inform lower servants.' Chu Huai Wang saw the Qin wang's letter and was worried by it. Desired go, feared be deceived; Not going, he feared Qin's anger. Zhao Ju said: 'Wang do not go, but mobilize troops self defend. Qin tiger wolf, cannot trust, has annex feudal lords heart.' Huai Wang son Zi Lan urged wang go, said: 'How cut off Qin harmonious heart!' Thereupon he went to meet Qin Zhao Wang. Zhao Wang deceived and commanded one general to hide troops at Wu Guan, calling himself Qin wang. The Chu wang arrived. They then closed Wu Guan and proceeded west to Xian Yang. He attended at Zhang Tai like a vassal minister and was not given equal ceremony. Chu Huai Wang was greatly angered and regretted not using Zhao Zi's words. Qin therefore detained the Chu wang and demanded the cession of the Wu and Qian Zhong commanderies. The Chu wang desired an alliance. Qin desired to first obtain the land. Chu wang angered said: 'Qin deceived me and moreover strongly demanded land from me!' He no longer permitted Qin. Qin therefore detained him.

æ¥šå¤§è‡£æ‚£ä¹‹ï¼Œä¹ƒç›¸èˆ‡è¬€æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¾ç‹åœ¨ç§¦ä¸å¾—é‚„ï¼Œè¦ä»¥å‰²åœ°ï¼Œè€Œå¤ªå­ç‚ºè³ªæ–¼é½Šï¼Œé½Šã€ç§¦åˆè¬€ï¼Œå‰‡æ¥šç„¡åœ‹çŸ£ã€‚ã€ ä¹ƒæ¬²ç«‹æ‡·ç‹å­åœ¨åœ‹è€…ã€‚ æ˜­é›æ›°ï¼šã€Œç‹èˆ‡å¤ªå­ä¿±å›°æ–¼è«¸ä¾¯ï¼Œè€Œä»Šåˆå€ç‹å‘½è€Œç«‹å…¶åº¶å­ï¼Œä¸å®œã€‚ã€ ä¹ƒè©èµ´æ–¼é½Šï¼Œé½Šæ¹£ç‹è¬‚å…¶ç›¸æ›°ï¼šã€Œä¸è‹¥ç•™å¤ªå­ä»¥æ±‚æ¥šä¹‹æ·®åŒ—ã€‚ã€ ç›¸æ›°ï¼šã€Œä¸å¯ï¼Œéƒ¢ä¸­ç«‹ç‹ï¼Œæ˜¯å¾æŠ±ç©ºè³ªè€Œè¡Œä¸ç¾©æ–¼å¤©ä¸‹ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ æˆ–æ›°ï¼šã€Œä¸ç„¶ã€‚ éƒ¢ä¸­ç«‹ç‹ï¼Œå› èˆ‡å…¶æ–°ç‹å¸‚æ›°ã€äºˆæˆ‘ä¸‹æ±åœ‹ï¼Œå¾ç‚ºç‹æ®ºå¤ªå­ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ï¼Œå°‡èˆ‡ä¸‰åœ‹å…±ç«‹ä¹‹ã€ï¼Œç„¶å‰‡æ±åœ‹å¿…å¯å¾—çŸ£ã€‚ã€ é½Šç‹å’ç”¨å…¶ç›¸è¨ˆè€Œæ­¸æ¥šå¤ªå­ã€‚ å¤ªå­æ©«è‡³ï¼Œç«‹ç‚ºç‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ç‚ºé ƒè¥„ç‹ã€‚ ä¹ƒå‘Šäºç§¦æ›°ï¼šã€Œè³´ç¤¾ç¨·ç¥éˆï¼Œåœ‹æœ‰ç‹çŸ£ã€‚ã€
Chu ministers worried it, then mutually planned said: 'Our wang in Qin cannot return, demands with cede land, but crown prince as hostage Qi, Qi, Qin combine plot, then Chu no state.' They then desired to establish a son of Huai Wang who was in the state. Zhao Ju said: 'Wang and crown prince both distressed by feudal lords, but now again betray wang command establish his concubine son, not proper.' Then deceived announced to Qi, Qi Min Wang told his prime minister said: 'Not if detain crown prince to seek Chu Huai Bei.' Prime minister said: 'Not possible, Ying middle established wang, this we hold empty hostage practice unrighteousness world.' Some said: 'Not so. Ying middle established wang, then with their new wang bargain said 'give me lower east state, I for wang kill crown prince, not so, will with three states together establish him', then east state certainly obtainable.' Qi wang finally used his prime minister's plan and returned the Chu crown prince. Crown prince Heng arrived and was established as wang. This was Qing Xiang Wang. Then informed Qin said: 'Rely altars soil spirits, state has wang.'

é ƒè¥„ç‹æ©«å…ƒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦è¦æ‡·ç‹ä¸å¯å¾—åœ°ï¼Œæ¥šç«‹ç‹ä»¥æ‡‰ç§¦ï¼Œç§¦æ˜­ç‹æ€’ï¼Œç™¼å…µå‡ºæ­¦é—œæ”»æ¥šï¼Œå¤§æ•—æ¥šè»ï¼Œæ–¬é¦–äº”è¬ï¼Œå–æåäº”åŸè€Œå»ã€‚ äºŒå¹´ï¼Œæ¥šæ‡·ç‹äº¡é€ƒæ­¸ï¼Œç§¦è¦ºä¹‹ï¼Œé®æ¥šé“ï¼Œæ‡·ç‹æï¼Œä¹ƒå¾é–’é“èµ°è¶™ä»¥æ±‚æ­¸ã€‚ è¶™ä¸»çˆ¶åœ¨ä»£ï¼Œå…¶å­æƒ ç‹åˆç«‹ï¼Œè¡Œç‹äº‹ï¼Œæï¼Œä¸æ•¢å…¥æ¥šç‹ã€‚ æ¥šç‹æ¬²èµ°é­ï¼Œç§¦è¿½è‡³ï¼Œé‚èˆ‡ç§¦ä½¿å¾©ä¹‹ç§¦ã€‚ æ‡·ç‹é‚ç™¼ç—…ã€‚ é ƒè¥„ç‹ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œæ‡·ç‹å’äºç§¦ï¼Œç§¦æ­¸å…¶å–ªäºæ¥šã€‚ æ¥šäººçš†æ†ä¹‹ï¼Œå¦‚æ‚²è¦ªæˆšã€‚ è«¸ä¾¯ç”±æ˜¯ä¸ç›´ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦æ¥šçµ•ã€‚
In Qing Xiang Wang Heng's first year, Qin demanded that Huai Wang give land but could not obtain it. Chu established a wang to respond to Qin. Qin Zhao Wang was angered and mobilized troops out of Wu Guan to attack Chu. He greatly defeated the Chu army, beheaded fifty thousand heads, took Xi's fifteen cities, and departed. In the second year, Chu Huai Wang fled and escaped to return. Qin became aware and blocked the Chu road. Huai Wang feared and then fled to Zhao by a byway to seek return. Zhao Zhu Fu was in Dai. His son Hui Wang had first been established and was conducting wang affairs. He feared and did not dare receive the Chu wang. The Chu wang desired to flee to Wei. Qin pursued and reached him. He then went with the Qin envoy again to Qin. Huai Wang then fell ill. In Qing Xiang Wang's third year, Huai Wang died in Qin. Qin returned his funeral to Chu. All Chu people pitied him, like grieving relatives. The feudal lords therefore did not consider Qin upright. Qin and Chu cut off relations.

å…­å¹´ï¼Œç§¦ä½¿ç™½èµ·ä¼éŸ“æ–¼ä¼Šé—•ï¼Œå¤§å‹ï¼Œæ–¬é¦–äºŒåå››è¬ã€‚ ç§¦ä¹ƒéºæ¥šç‹æ›¸æ›°ï¼šã€Œæ¥šå€ç§¦ï¼Œç§¦ä¸”ç‡è«¸ä¾¯ä¼æ¥šï¼Œçˆ­ä¸€æ—¦ä¹‹å‘½ã€‚ é¡˜ç‹ä¹‹é£­å£«å’ï¼Œå¾—ä¸€æ¨‚æˆ°ã€‚ã€ æ¥šé ƒè¥„ç‹æ‚£ä¹‹ï¼Œä¹ƒè¬€å¾©èˆ‡ç§¦å¹³ã€‚ ä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œæ¥šè¿å©¦æ–¼ç§¦ï¼Œç§¦æ¥šå¾©å¹³ã€‚
In the sixth year, Qin sent Bai Qi to attack Han at Yi Que. He was greatly victorious and beheaded twenty-four thousand heads. Qin then sent Chu wang letter said: 'Chu betrayed Qin, Qin moreover will lead feudal lords attack Chu, contend one morning fate. Wish wang prepare soldiers, obtain one happy battle.' Chu Qing Xiang Wang was worried by it and then planned to make peace with Qin again. In the seventh year, Chu welcomed a bride from Qin. Qin and Chu were at peace again.

Eleventh year, Qi Qin each self called emperor; After more than a month, they again returned from emperor to wang.

åå››å¹´ï¼Œæ¥šé ƒè¥„ç‹èˆ‡ç§¦æ˜­ç‹å¥½æœƒäºå®›ï¼Œçµå’Œè¦ªã€‚ åäº”å¹´ï¼Œæ¥šç‹èˆ‡ç§¦ã€ä¸‰æ™‰ã€ç‡•å…±ä¼é½Šï¼Œå–æ·®åŒ—ã€‚ åå…­å¹´ï¼Œèˆ‡ç§¦æ˜­ç‹å¥½æœƒæ–¼é„¢ã€‚ å…¶ç§‹ï¼Œå¾©èˆ‡ç§¦ç‹æœƒç©°ã€‚
In the fourteenth year, Chu Qing Xiang Wang and Qin Zhao Wang had a friendly meeting at Wan and formed a peace marriage alliance. In the fifteenth year, the Chu wang together with Qin, the three Jin, and Yan attacked Qi and took Huai Bei. In the sixteenth year, he had a friendly meeting with Qin Zhao Wang at Yan. That autumn, he again met with the Qin wang at Rang.

ä»Šæ¥šä¹‹åœ°æ–¹äº”åƒé‡Œï¼Œå¸¶ç”²ç™¾è¬ï¼ŒçŒ¶è¶³ä»¥è¸´èºä¸­é‡ä¹Ÿï¼Œè€Œåå—å›°ï¼Œè‡£ç«Šç‚ºå¤§ç‹å¼—å–ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ æ–¼æ˜¯é ƒè¥„ç‹é£ä½¿æ–¼è«¸ä¾¯ï¼Œå¾©ç‚ºå¾ï¼Œæ¬²ä»¥ä¼ç§¦ã€‚ ç§¦èä¹‹ï¼Œç™¼å…µä¾†ä¼æ¥šã€‚
In the eighteenth year, there was a Chu person who enjoyed using a weak bow with slight string to add to returning geese above. Qing Xiang Wang heard of it and summoned him to question. Replied said: 'Small minister hobby shoot wild geese, net ducks, small arrow release, what sufficient for great wang speak. Moreover, praising Chu's greatness and because of the great wang's virtue, what is hunted is not just this. Formerly the three wang hunted with morality and virtue, the five hegemons hunted with the warring states. Therefore Qin, Wei, Yan, Zhao, wild geese; Qi, Lu, Han, Wei, green heads; Zou, Fei, Tan, and Pi are net ducks. Besides these, the remaining are not worth shooting. See birds six pairs, with wang what take? Wang why not with sage as bow, brave warriors as string, timely draw shoot them? These six pairs can be obtained and carried in bags. Its joy is not just morning and evening joy, its gain is not just ducks and geese substance. The wang in the morning draws his bow and shoots south of Wei's Da Liang, adds to its right arm and directly attaches it to Han. Then the Central Plains road is cut off and Shang Cai's commandery is ruined. Returning to shoot east of Yu, loosening Wei's left elbow and outward striking Ding Tao, then Wei's east outside is abandoned and the two commanderies of Da Song and Fang Yu are raised. Moreover Wei cut two arms, overturned; Striking Tan state chest-wise, Da Liang can be obtained and possessed. The wang draws his string at Lan Tai, drinks his horse at Xi He, settles Wei's Da Liang. This is the joy of one shot. If the wang sincerely enjoys hunting and is not weary, then take the precious bow, sharpen the new string, shoot big birds at the East Sea, return and cover the Long Wall as defense. Morning shoot East Ju, evening shoot Pei Qiu, night add Ji Mo, look back and occupy Wu Dao. Then the east of the Long Wall is collected and the north of Tai Shan is raised. West connecting borders with Zhao and north reaching Yan, the three states spread like cranes. Then the alliance can be completed without waiting for agreement. North roaming the eyes at Yan's Liao Dong and south climbing to view Yue's Kui Ji, this is the joy of the second shot. As for the twelve feudal lords on the Si, entwining left and sweeping right, they can be exhausted in one morning. Now Qin broke Han as long worry, obtained row cities not dare guard; Attacking Wei without merit, striking Zhao and looking back ill, then Qin and Wei's brave strength is bent. Chu's old lands of Han Zhong, Xi, and Li can be obtained and possessed again. The wang takes the precious bow, sharpens the new string, fords the Meng barrier, and waits for Qin to weary. Then Shan Dong and He Nei can be obtained and united. Labor the people and rest the masses, face south and be called wang. Therefore said Qin as great bird, bear all under heaven reside, east face stand, left arm occupy Zhao southwest, right arm attach Chu Yan Ying, chest strike Han Wei, hang head Central Plains, place already form convenient, situation has land profit, rouse wings beat crane, square three thousand li, then Qin not can obtain alone beckon night shoot.' He desired to anger Xiang Wang, therefore replied with these words. Xiang Wang therefore summoned spoke with, then said: 'Indeed former wang by Qin deceived guest died outside, resentment none greater. Now with a commoner having resentment, there is still repaying ten thousand chariots. Bai Gong and Zi Xu are examples. Now Chu territory five thousand li, armored one hundred thousand, still sufficient leap middle field, but sit receive distress, minister secretly for great wang not take.' Thereupon Qing Xiang Wang sent envoys to the feudal lords, again formed an alliance, desiring to attack Qin. Qin heard it and mobilized troops to come attack Chu.
91
æ¥šæ¬²èˆ‡é½ŠéŸ“é€£å’Œä¼ç§¦ï¼Œå› æ¬²åœ–å‘¨ã€‚ å‘¨ç‹èµ§ä½¿æ­¦å…¬è¬‚æ¥šç›¸æ˜­å­æ›°ï¼šã€Œä¸‰åœ‹ä»¥å…µå‰²å‘¨éƒŠåœ°ä»¥ä¾¿è¼¸ï¼Œè€Œå—å™¨ä»¥å°Šæ¥šï¼Œè‡£ä»¥ç‚ºä¸ç„¶ã€‚ å¤«å¼’å…±ä¸»ï¼Œè‡£ä¸–å›ï¼Œå¤§åœ‹ä¸è¦ªï¼› ä»¥çœ¾è„…å¯¡ï¼Œå°åœ‹ä¸é™„ã€‚ å¤§åœ‹ä¸è¦ªï¼Œå°åœ‹ä¸é™„ï¼Œä¸å¯ä»¥è‡´åå¯¦ã€‚ åå¯¦ä¸å¾—ï¼Œä¸è¶³ä»¥å‚·æ°‘ã€‚ å¤«æœ‰åœ–å‘¨ä¹‹è²ï¼Œéæ‰€ä»¥ç‚ºè™Ÿä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ æ˜­å­æ›°ï¼šã€Œä¹ƒåœ–å‘¨å‰‡ç„¡ä¹‹ã€‚ é›–ç„¶ï¼Œå‘¨ä½•æ•…ä¸å¯åœ–ä¹Ÿï¼Ÿã€ å°æ›°ï¼šã€Œè»ä¸äº”ä¸æ”»ï¼ŒåŸä¸åä¸åœã€‚ å¤«ä¸€å‘¨ç‚ºäºŒåæ™‰ï¼Œå…¬ä¹‹æ‰€çŸ¥ä¹Ÿã€‚ éŸ“å˜—ä»¥äºŒåè¬ä¹‹çœ¾è¾±æ–¼æ™‰ä¹‹åŸä¸‹ï¼ŒéŠ³å£«æ­»ï¼Œä¸­å£«å‚·ï¼Œè€Œæ™‰ä¸æ‹”ã€‚ å…¬ä¹‹ç„¡ç™¾éŸ“ä»¥åœ–å‘¨ï¼Œæ­¤å¤©ä¸‹ä¹‹æ‰€çŸ¥ä¹Ÿã€‚ å¤«æ€¨çµå…©å‘¨ä»¥å¡é¨¶é­¯ä¹‹å¿ƒï¼Œäº¤çµ•æ–¼é½Šï¼Œè²å¤±å¤©ä¸‹ï¼Œå…¶ç‚ºäº‹å±çŸ£ã€‚ å¤«å±å…©å‘¨ä»¥åšä¸‰å·ï¼Œæ–¹åŸä¹‹å¤–å¿…ç‚ºéŸ“å¼±çŸ£ã€‚ ä½•ä»¥çŸ¥å…¶ç„¶ä¹Ÿï¼Ÿ è¥¿å‘¨ä¹‹åœ°ï¼Œçµ•é•·è£œçŸ­ï¼Œä¸éç™¾é‡Œã€‚ åç‚ºå¤©ä¸‹å…±ä¸»ï¼Œè£‚å…¶åœ°ä¸è¶³ä»¥è‚¥åœ‹ï¼Œå¾—å…¶çœ¾ä¸è¶³ä»¥å‹å…µã€‚ é›–ç„¡æ”»ä¹‹ï¼Œåç‚ºå¼’å›ã€‚ ç„¶è€Œå¥½äº‹ä¹‹å›ï¼Œå–œæ”»ä¹‹è‡£ï¼Œç™¼è™Ÿç”¨å…µï¼Œæœªå˜—ä¸ä»¥å‘¨ç‚ºçµ‚å§‹ã€‚ æ˜¯ä½•ä¹Ÿï¼Ÿ è¦‹ç¥­å™¨åœ¨ç„‰ï¼Œæ¬²å™¨ä¹‹è‡³è€Œå¿˜å¼’å›ä¹‹äº‚ã€‚ ä»ŠéŸ“ä»¥å™¨ä¹‹åœ¨æ¥šï¼Œè‡£æå¤©ä¸‹ä»¥å™¨è®æ¥šä¹Ÿã€‚ è‡£è«‹è­¬ä¹‹ã€‚ å¤«è™è‚‰è‡Šï¼Œå…¶å…µåˆ©èº«ï¼ŒäººçŒ¶æ”»ä¹‹ä¹Ÿã€‚ è‹¥ä½¿æ¾¤ä¸­ä¹‹éº‹è’™è™ä¹‹çš®ï¼Œäººä¹‹æ”»ä¹‹å¿…è¬æ–¼è™çŸ£ã€‚ è£‚æ¥šä¹‹åœ°ï¼Œè¶³ä»¥è‚¥åœ‹ï¼› è©˜æ¥šä¹‹åï¼Œè¶³ä»¥å°Šä¸»ã€‚ ä»Šå­å°‡ä»¥æ¬²èª…æ®˜å¤©ä¸‹ä¹‹å…±ä¸»ï¼Œå±…ä¸‰ä»£ä¹‹å‚³å™¨ï¼Œåä¸‰ç¿®å…­ç¿¼ï¼Œä»¥é«˜ä¸–ä¸»ï¼Œéè²ªè€Œä½•ï¼Ÿ ã€Šå‘¨æ›¸ã€‹æ›°ã€æ¬²èµ·ç„¡å…ˆã€ï¼Œæ•…å™¨å—å‰‡å…µè‡³çŸ£ã€‚ã€ æ–¼æ˜¯æ¥šè¨ˆè¼Ÿä¸è¡Œã€‚
Chu desired to connect in peace with Qi and Han to attack Qin, therefore desired to plot against Zhou. Zhou wang Nan sent Wu Gong told Chu prime minister Zhao Zi said: 'Three states with troops cut Zhou suburb land to facilitate transport, south vessels to honor Chu, minister think not so. Indeed assassinate common lord, minister hereditary lord, great states not close; Coercing the few with the many, small states will not attach. Great states not close, small states not attach, cannot achieve name and substance. Name and substance not obtained, not sufficient to harm the people. Indeed having plot Zhou reputation, not what to call banner.' Zhao Zi said: 'As for plotting Zhou then none. Although, Zhou why cannot plot?' Replied said: 'Army not five not attack, city not ten not surround. Indeed one Zhou equals twenty Jin states. This is what the duke knows. Han once with two hundred thousand troops was humiliated below Jin's city walls. Sharp soldiers died, middle soldiers were injured, but Jin was not taken. The duke has no hundred Han states to plot against Zhou. This is what the world knows. Indeed resentment tying the two Zhou states will block Zou and Lu's hearts. Relations cut with Qi, reputation lost in the world. Its affairs will be dangerous. Indeed endangering the two Zhou states to thicken San Chuan, outside Fang Cheng will certainly become weak for Han. How know it so? Western Zhou's lands, cutting the long to supplement the short, do not exceed one hundred li. Named the world's common lord, splitting its land is not sufficient to enrich the state, obtaining its masses is not sufficient to strengthen the troops. Though not attacking it, it is named assassinating the lord. However, lords who love good affairs and ministers who love attacking, issuing orders and using troops, never fail to make Zhou the beginning and end. What this? Seeing sacrificial vessels there, desiring the vessels to arrive and forgetting the disorder of assassinating the lord. Now Han because the vessels are in Chu, the minister fears the world will enmity Chu because of the vessels. The minister requests to parable it. Indeed tiger meat is rancid, its weapons are sharp and its body strong, yet people still attack it. If a deer in the marsh wears tiger skin, people attacking it will certainly be ten thousand times more than attacking a tiger. Split Chu lands, sufficient enrich state; Bending Chu's reputation is sufficient to honor the lord. Now you will with desire execute harm world common lord, dwell three dynasties transmitted vessels, swallow three pinions six wings, high world lord, not greedy what? 'Zhou Book' says 'desire rise no first', therefore vessels south then troops arrive.' Thereupon Chu's plan stopped and was not carried out.
92
åä¹å¹´ï¼Œç§¦ä¼æ¥šï¼Œæ¥šè»æ•—ï¼Œå‰²ä¸Šåº¸ã€æ¼¢åŒ—åœ°äºˆç§¦ã€‚ äºŒåå¹´ï¼Œç§¦å°‡ç™½èµ·æ‹”æˆ‘è¥¿é™µã€‚ äºŒåä¸€å¹´ï¼Œç§¦å°‡ç™½èµ·é‚æ‹”æˆ‘éƒ¢ï¼Œç‡’å…ˆç‹å¢“å¤·é™µã€‚ æ¥šè¥„ç‹å…µæ•£ï¼Œé‚ä¸å¾©æˆ°ï¼Œæ±åŒ—ä¿æ–¼é™³åŸã€‚ äºŒåäºŒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦å¾©æ‹”æˆ‘å·«ã€é»”ä¸­éƒ¡ã€‚
In the nineteenth year, Qin attacked Chu. The Chu army was defeated and cut Shang Yong and Han Bei lands to give to Qin. In the twentieth year, Qin general Bai Qi took our Xi Ling. In the twenty-first year, Qin general Bai Qi then took our Ying and burned the former wang's tombs at Yi Ling. Chu Xiang Wang's troops scattered. He then no longer fought and defended northeast at Chen city. In the twenty-second year, Qin again took our Wu and Qian Zhong commanderies.
93
äºŒåä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œè¥„ç‹ä¹ƒæ”¶æ±åœ°å…µï¼Œå¾—åé¤˜è¬ï¼Œå¾©è¥¿å–ç§¦æ‰€æ‹”æˆ‘æ±Ÿæ—åäº”é‚‘ä»¥ç‚ºéƒ¡ï¼Œè·ç§¦ã€‚ äºŒåä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œä½¿ä¸‰è¬äººåŠ©ä¸‰æ™‰ä¼ç‡•ã€‚ å¾©èˆ‡ç§¦å¹³ï¼Œè€Œå…¥å¤ªå­ç‚ºè³ªæ–¼ç§¦ã€‚ æ¥šä½¿å·¦å¾’ä¾å¤ªå­æ–¼ç§¦ã€‚
In the twenty-third year, Xiang Wang then gathered troops from the east lands, obtaining more than one hundred thousand. He again took to the west the fifteen cities Qin had taken along our Jiang River to make a commandery and resisted Qin. In the twenty-seventh year, he sent thirty thousand people to help the three Jin attack Yan. He again made peace with Qin and entered the crown prince as hostage in Qin. Chu sent the left follower to attend the crown prince in Qin.
94
ä¸‰åå…­å¹´ï¼Œé ƒè¥„ç‹ç—…ï¼Œå¤ªå­äº¡æ­¸ã€‚ ç§‹ï¼Œé ƒè¥„ç‹å’ï¼Œå¤ªå­ç†Šå…ƒä»£ç«‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ç‚ºè€ƒçƒˆç‹ã€‚ è€ƒçƒˆç‹ä»¥å·¦å¾’ç‚ºä»¤å°¹ï¼Œå°ä»¥å³ï¼Œè™Ÿæ˜¥ç”³å›ã€‚
In the thirty-sixth year, Qing Xiang Wang fell ill. The crown prince fled back. In autumn, Qing Xiang Wang died. Crown prince Xiong Yuan replaced him and ascended, becoming Kao Lie Wang. Kao Lie Wang made the left follower Ling Yin, enfeoffed him with Wu, and named him Chun Shen Jun.
95
è€ƒçƒˆç‹å…ƒå¹´ï¼Œç´å·äºç§¦ä»¥å¹³ã€‚ æ˜¯æ™‚æ¥šç›Šå¼±ã€‚
In Kao Lie Wang's first year, he gave Zhou to Qin to make peace. At this time Chu grew increasingly weak.
96
å…­å¹´ï¼Œç§¦åœé‚¯é„²ï¼Œè¶™å‘Šæ€¥æ¥šï¼Œæ¥šé£å°‡è»æ™¯é™½æ•‘è¶™ã€‚ ä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œè‡³æ–°ä¸­ã€‚ ç§¦å…µå»ã€‚ åäºŒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ˜­ç‹å’ï¼Œæ¥šç‹ä½¿æ˜¥ç”³å›å¼”ç¥ äºç§¦ã€‚ åå…­å¹´ï¼Œç§¦èŠè¥„ç‹å’ï¼Œç§¦ç‹è¶™æ”¿ç«‹ã€‚ äºŒåäºŒå¹´ï¼Œèˆ‡è«¸ä¾¯å…±ä¼ç§¦ï¼Œä¸åˆ©è€Œå»ã€‚ æ¥šæ±å¾™éƒ½å£½æ˜¥ï¼Œå‘½æ›°éƒ¢ã€‚
In the sixth year, Qin surrounded Han Dan. Zhao urgently informed Chu. Chu sent general Jing Yang to save Zhao. In the seventh year, he arrived at Xin Zhong. The Qin troops departed. In the twelfth year, Qin Zhao Wang died. The Chu wang sent Chun Shen Jun to offer condolences and sacrifices in Qin. In the sixteenth year, Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang died. Qin wang Zhao Zheng was established. In the twenty-second year, together with the feudal lords he attacked Qin, but it was unfavorable and he departed. Chu moved the capital east to Shou Chun and named it Ying.
97
äºŒåäº”å¹´ï¼Œè€ƒçƒˆç‹å’ï¼Œå­å¹½ç‹æ‚ç«‹ã€‚ æåœ’æ®ºæ˜¥ç”³å›ã€‚ å¹½ç‹ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œç§¦ã€é­ä¼æ¥šã€‚ ç§¦ç›¸å‘‚ä¸éŸ‹å’ã€‚ ä¹å¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ»…éŸ“ã€‚ åå¹´ï¼Œå¹½ç‹å’ï¼ŒåŒæ¯å¼ŸçŒ¶ä»£ç«‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ç‚ºå“€ç‹ã€‚ å“€ç‹ç«‹äºŒæœˆé¤˜ï¼Œå“€ç‹åº¶å…„è² èŠ»ä¹‹å¾’è¥²æ®ºå“€ç‹è€Œç«‹è² èŠ»ç‚ºç‹ã€‚ æ˜¯æ­²ï¼Œç§¦è™œè¶™ç‹é·ã€‚
In the twenty-fifth year, Kao Lie Wang died. His son You Wang Han was established. Li Yuan killed Chun Shen Jun. In You Wang's third year, Qin and Wei attacked Chu. Qin prime minister Lu Bu Wei died. In the ninth year, Qin extinguished Han. In the tenth year, You Wang died. His same-mother younger brother You replaced him and was established, becoming Ai Wang. Ai Wang was established for more than two months. Ai Wang's concubine elder brother Fu Chu's followers raided and killed Ai Wang, establishing Fu Chu as wang. This year, Qin captured Zhao wang Qian.
98
ç‹è² èŠ»å…ƒå¹´ï¼Œç‡•å¤ªå­ä¸¹ä½¿èŠè»»åˆºç§¦ç‹ã€‚ äºŒå¹´ï¼Œç§¦ä½¿å°‡è»ä¼æ¥šï¼Œå¤§ç ´æ¥šè»ï¼Œäº¡åé¤˜åŸã€‚ ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œç§¦æ»…é­ã€‚ å››å¹´ï¼Œç§¦å°‡ç‹ç¿¦ç ´æˆ‘è»æ–¼è˜„ï¼Œè€Œæ®ºå°‡è»é …ç‡•ã€‚
In wang Fu Chu's first year, Yan crown prince Dan sent Jing Ke to assassinate the Qin wang. In the second year, Qin sent a general to attack Chu. He greatly broke the Chu army and lost more than ten cities. In the third year, Qin extinguished Wei. In the fourth year, Qin general Wang Jian broke our army at Qi and killed general Xiang Yan.
99
äº”å¹´ï¼Œç§¦å°‡ç‹ç¿¦ã€è’™æ­¦é‚ç ´æ¥šåœ‹ï¼Œè™œæ¥šç‹è² èŠ»ï¼Œæ»…æ¥šåç‚ºï¼»æ¥šï¼½éƒ¡äº‘ã€‚
Fifth year, Qin generals Wang Jian, Meng Wu then broke Chu state, captured Chu wang Fu Chu, extinguished Chu named [Chu] commandery.
100
å¤ªå²å…¬æ›°ï¼šæ¥šéˆç‹æ–¹æœƒè«¸ä¾¯æ–¼ç”³ï¼Œèª…é½Šæ…¶å°ï¼Œä½œç« è¯è‡ºï¼Œæ±‚å‘¨ä¹é¼ä¹‹æ™‚ï¼Œå¿—å°å¤©ä¸‹ï¼› åŠé¤“æ­»äºç”³äº¥ä¹‹å®¶ï¼Œç‚ºå¤©ä¸‹ç¬‘ã€‚ æ“è¡Œä¹‹ä¸å¾—ï¼Œæ‚²å¤«ï¼ å‹¢ä¹‹æ–¼äººä¹Ÿï¼Œå¯ä¸æ…èˆ‡ï¼Ÿ æ£„ç–¾ä»¥äº‚ç«‹ï¼Œå¬–æ·«ç§¦å¥³ï¼Œç”šä¹å“‰ï¼Œå¹¾å†äº¡åœ‹ï¼
Grand Historian said: Chu Ling Wang just assembled feudal lords at Shen, executed Qi Qing Feng, built Zhang Hua Tai, sought Zhou nine tripods time, ambitions small world; He reached the point of starving to death at Shen Hai's home and became the world's laughingstock. Conduct conduct not obtained, sorrowful! Power to people, can not careful? Qi Ji with disorder established, favored lewd Qin woman, extreme, nearly again perished state!
